column4: I'm playing with a new install of Dapper 6.06, my screen saver works ok, but when I wake up in theh morning, the box is frozen, and won't reboot into X. Running startx  at reboot locks up too. To get here now, I had to boot into safe graphics mode, recreate my user, etc... I didn't have this trouble with 5.10, ideas?
If that is a new install, you might consider installing 8.04 because 6.06 will end life in a few months
roger that, and that is my plan, but I can't get 8.04 until 6.06 is working.
